description:
Katt did her first bondage shoot here on with us, and she has returned to show off how much more she can take. She wants to be pushed; she made that clear when she arrived.
There is something amazing about having a model arrive on set and have the exact same goal for the day as the director.
We get here set up for the first position, which is a column suspension. This is not the usual way, because it's a intense way to start the day, but this is what she is craving. The action gets tough, quickly, and again it's exactly what both Katt and The Pope want.
The bondage continues to get more challenging throughout the day. The torment gets harder to handle, but in the end Katt gets pushed as hard as she can be, and we get an amazing update with everything you expect from SR.
title: Signs of Improvement
